mapper.select: select * from message where id in ( select max(id) from message where status !=2 and from_id!=1 and (from_id=#{userId} or to_id=#{userId}) group by conversation_id ) order by create_time desc limit #{offset},#{limit}
select count(m.maxid) from (select max(id) as maxid from message where status!=2 and from_id!=1 and(from_id=#{userId} or to_id=#{userId}) group by conversation_id) as m
